body:
*gets to the end*  well.... fuck.
I have literally only logged in for the sole purpose of call those ghosts a bunch of ungrateful little shits.

I guess that ghost keeps its contract no matter what.  
Accept it to your body, tumors; Reject it too long, rape and tumors; Attempt to birth it in a fetus, does it alien style; Abort it in a fetus, damn thing goes back to being a "ghost of unborn children", now really pissed off, rape and tumors;  Plan to birth it via c-section, bet it does alien style before you can, or it dies then goes abortion route.
Seems like a 100% loss to me, even if you were to nuke it from space there's no way.

The irony is that Madoka's plan actually killed her completely pointlessly.  Without it the worst case seems two girls and Uno die... If she didn't try to get pregnant then she and Uno would survive. Would've liked to see more reaction scenes too.
It'd probably sell decently as a traditional horror if the ages were tweaked and smut toned down a little.
I find this difficult to masturbate to
this is definetly missing the "story arc" tag, please add
What a cunt ghost, just wait a month or two and get born the normal way??
Man i loved the plot twist. Awesome work kakeru-sensei

I... I 
I have no words. Fuck you author, that twist ending is bullshit. I'm sad, shocked and angry all at the same time. Well fucking played, but you're losing a favourite.

Now excuse me while I deal with this weird feeling in my womb.
I really loved those girls... I feel awful

The last time i was this involved in the plot of a hentai was 5 years ago! This was really good, the storytelling was on point and that end will keep me up at night, because i'll be honest i'm a fucking pussy when it comes to the horror genre (seriously, i had nightmares for a week after watching "I Am Legend" the first time), but this was so good that i can't really be mad.
it was a good story until the ending
Man such an intriguing horror story. Medium-length and got the dread kinda on point. The plot is also consistent and the gore is so well done lol.

i actually felt like i was watching an anime. towards the end i was so happy and ready for the wholesome ending but OOF. BAD ENDING. that thing really is a monster.. although overall i loved this a fuck ton.

The bells of hell are ringing. 
A peal of twisted joy. 
They celebrate the bringing of a bastard baby boy.           

At birth his soul was taken. 
All love replaced with hate. 
He's now the child of satan, a child whose might is great.           

Three all tried to intervene, the father, son, and ghost. 
None of them could come between this child and it's host.             

For once the act of killing would not be classed as sin.
For everyday he's living, Armageddon closes in.
Can this even be considered as a hentai? I was so enveloped into the story that I forgot it was a hentai.
Well... my original goal was to fap when I came on this site, but instead I just got really invested into this horror story, especially since I'm high af... was pretty good
damn im not that into horror or gore when trying to masturbate but that actually was captivating

I absolutely hate it 
But damn is it good
Eh..... I don't came for this kind of history but interesting indeed
this has amazing storytelling and is also... Really Long........... props to the translator and mangaka

Holy shit this is truly a masterpiece of storytelling. Fully captivating and horrifying at the same time. I can't even explain how terrified page 146 made me. The ending kinda pissed me off but I'm.also.drunk so maybe that's why lmao one of my favourites on this site, but not masturbation purposes.
Good thing I checked the damn thing or else I would've favorited a bloody horror hentai
Advice: Skim through the thumbnails first so you'll know what to expect with this one
my dick got fully soft XD
That's one horror hentai that's top tier horror storytelling. I knew that ending was coming since it was already hinted with the first girl's dead body. But damn that fat guy is one lucky chap.
Is this a new season of yami shibai or what
Whaaaat theeee fuuuuuck? But like, really WHAAAAT THEEEEE FUUUUCK?!
I mean at some point you don't wanna fap so much as read a book, this is that
